title: The Curse of Saree
overview: Nuannuerkaew Jaz has never thought of going to India, but now she has to fly to India for her sister Nilapat, who is going to get married to Chaithat, the prince of Muntra Putra the small city in India. Everything was going to be fine until Queen Sasiprapai doesn't accept Nilapat as her daughter in law. She sets up Savitree for Chaithat, a trouble maker who will ruin Nilapat and Chaithat's wedding ceremony. Everything would turn out great if she didn't see Giris, Chaithat's brother, whom she fell in love at first sight.
